channel.title: databases on Jose Enrique Pons Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content in databases on Jose Enrique Pons Personal Site

item.title: MongoDB commands
item.description: Connect to mongo using SSL certificates mongo --host hostname --port 27027 -ssl --sslPEMKeyFile /path/to/file --sslCAFile /path/to/file Login as admin user use admin db.auth('user','passwd') show databases show databases show collections show collections explore collections db.collectionname.find()

item.title: handling mysql permissions
item.description: Handling MySQL users and permissions grant all privileges on <gcc>.* to '<gcc>'@'localhost' identified by '<password'; grant all privileges on <gcc>.* to '<gcc>'@'<FQN_ROR_hostname> ' identified by '<password'; Resources 13.7.5.17 SHOW GRANTS Syntax
